featured.text: For example, in a wedding banquet it is common to see a pair of ice-sculpted swans that represent the union of the new couple. 49.

definition.zh_def: 盛宴，通常是為了慶祝某個特別的場合而舉行的正式餐會。
definition.en_def: A formal meal or feast held in honor of a particular occasion.
definition.example: The company hosted a grand banquet to celebrate its anniversary.
